payload.text:
**Composing final response message**

I'm putting together a clear final message that explains the dark-mode toggle changes with a concise opening sentence, bullet points referencing exact file lines, and commands for linting and running the dev server. This way, the user can easily see what was done and how to verify it.

payload.message:
Dark-mode toggle now updates the entire document and no longer gets stuck when the system theme is involved.

- `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:30` moved the background/text transition classes onto `<body>` so the whole page responds to the `dark` class while the inner flex wrapper just handles layout.
- `packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/theme-toggle.tsx:15` switched to `resolvedTheme` (with `aria-pressed`) so clicking the button always flips between light/dark, even when the active theme was inherited.

- Verification: `pnpm lint`

You may want to run `pnpm dev` and confirm the toggle in the browser.

summary.text:
**Composing final response message**

I'm putting together a clear final message that explains the dark-mode toggle changes with a concise opening sentence, bullet points referencing exact file lines, and commands for linting and running the dev server. This way, the user can easily see what was done and how to verify it.

content.text:
Dark-mode toggle now updates the entire document and no longer gets stuck when the system theme is involved.

- `app/web/gapyear/app/layout.tsx:30` moved the background/text transition classes onto `<body>` so the whole page responds to the `dark` class while the inner flex wrapper just handles layout.
- `packages/ui/shadcn/components/ui/theme-toggle.tsx:15` switched to `resolvedTheme` (with `aria-pressed`) so clicking the button always flips between light/dark, even when the active theme was inherited.

- Verification: `pnpm lint`

You may want to run `pnpm dev` and confirm the toggle in the browser.
